Name: Buy Beverage
Description: Buy the drink which is depicted in the lower right corner

Name: Chart Course
Description: Tap and drag the ship along the grid line.

Name: Clean O2 Filter
Description: Tap and drag the floating leaves toward the hole.

Name: Divert Power
Locations: (1) Reactor. (2) Admin, Cafeteria, Communications, Greenhouse, Laboratory, Launchpad, MedBay, Office
Description: Step 1: Pull up the glowing lever on the device. Step 2: Flip the switch in the center.

Name: Enter ID Code
Description: Take the ID out of the wallet and type the ID code into the screen

Name: Fix Wiring
Locations: (1) Storage, Hallway, Locker Room. (2) Greenhouse, Hallway, Locker Room. (3) Greenhouse, Laboratory, Locker Room.3
Steps: Step 1, 2, 3: Connect wires of the same color.

Name: Fuel Engines
Description: Fill the gas tank by pressing and holding the button.

Name: Measure Weather
Description: Press the 'Begin' button on the lower right corner

Name: Prime Shields
Description: Tap all the red cells to make all the cells white.

Name: Run Diagnostics
Description: Press the red space key. After the countdown ends, tap the red anomaly circle

Name: Sort Samples
Description: Place the sample in the correct box

Name: Start Reactor
Description: Press the buttons in the exact sames order as the blue squares show on the left display.

Name: Submit Scan
Description: Stand on the platform and scan yourself.

Name: Unlock Manifolds
Description: Press the buttons in numerical order.

Name: Water Plants
Description: Step 1: Find a watering can on the shelf. Step 2: Water the plants
